name: Slacker Stacker
description:
Stack dice and don't get caught!

A state-of-the-art simulation of  what it's like when you're bored and it's not your turn! Just make sure the DM doesn't notice what you're doing...

Royal Beetle Entertainment is a one-beetle-show. All of the art, programming, concept, dialogue, and design is done by me. Music and sound effects (other than the dice clacking) are courtesy of https://www.zapsplat.com and https://mixkit.co/.

Entry for GMTK Game Jam 2022.

by Royal Beetle Entertainment
